title: Hypothesis Testing
text: Hypothesis testing refers to coming up with a hypothesis and testing it using different statistical methods to see whether the hypothesis is supported by the data.

title: Correlation
text: Correlation is determined after the linear relationship has been predicted, and defines the extent to which the variables affect each other.

title: Regression
text: Regression is using data to create a linear trend to make predictions.

title: Chi-Square
text: Chi-Square is a hypothesis test used to see if two variables are independent in influencing the test statistic and is not used for prediction.
